Usage:
Bring the whole banana to soak in warm water at a temperature of 50 degrees Celsius for 10 minutes. Keep the bananas in a place with a temperature of 25 degrees Celsius. This method can be stored for up to 8-10 days.
Tear off all the bananas from the pole and wrap the banana with paper or plastic film, preservation or plastic bag. Wrapped one by one separately and then refrigerated in a vegetable freezer. This method can be stored for up to 14 days or more.

Only At Tops.productDetails:
Properties:
My Choice Soya Duck Soft texture, fragrant, delicious stew.
Selected every step.
• Good breed duck - Cherry Valley species from England.
• Farming methods - Independent release in the closed system, certified by the Department of Livestock Development.
• Food - Eat vegetarian food, so clean, not stink.
Manufacturing.
• Select the appropriate size and age - making the duck meat that is soft, delicious, not too sticky or rough.
• 100% physical appearance - not bruised, bruised, in good condition Purely plucking Suitable for respecting.

Ingredients:
Main Ingredients:

Braised Duck with Innards (79.38%)
Duck (1 whole duck with 1 set of innards), seasonings (sugar, iodized salt, dark soy sauce), spices, thickening agent (INS 414), food flavoring additives (disodium 5'-ribonucleotide)

Braised Duck Broth (18.04%)
Water, seasonings (light soy sauce, dark soy sauce, sugar, iodized salt), spices, vegetable oil, thickening agent (INS 414)

Dipping Sauce (2.58%)
Water, sugar, pickled garlic, vinegar, iodized salt, food flavoring additive (monosodium L-glutamate)
Allergen Information: Contains wheat flour and soy products.

Usage:
The trick is to blanch before boiling, so that the duck skin does not fade. Firm and appetizing
• Modern boiling pot Steam and steam pressure systems are distributed evenly and evenly.
• Control your temperature and time to allow the steward to reach the duck meat. With aroma, spice, taste and appetizing color
• Apply to freezing at cold temperatures immediately To maintain quality with modern methods
• Quality control - QA inspections are carried out at factories that produce and randomly lock the products to meet all standards.
